272860.name: Wreckfest Sneak Peek 2.0
272860.description:
EXCLUSIVE NEXT CAR GAME BONUS

This Next Car Game Technology Sneak Peek features a playground that we use internally to test various features various like car damage and environment destruction. Version 2.0 contains a lot of cool content like physics cannon with explosive missiles, new destructive machinery, more spectacular stunts and a ton of dynamic stuff to blow up! The best thing about it is that you will get a chance to have fun with an amazing 24 cars and wreak havoc to your heart's content!
